list.name: Ritual oils
list.desc: A highly potent blend of essential oils and herbs, handcrafted to embody the powerful element of water.

list.name: Patchouli Oil
list.desc: Patchouli Oil has a warm, deep aroma that balances energy, attracts luck, love, and prosperity.

list.name: Dragon Blood Oil
list.desc: A potent resin oil for protection, strength, and magic rituals.

list.name: Aphrodite Oil
list.desc: Extracted from the eternal mysteries of the universe, it carries the mystical power of the goddess of love.

list.name: potion
list.desc: Magic Potions are bottled spells, working 2-3 times stronger to create desired effects anytime.

list.name: Lucky Wallpaper
list.desc: The Lucky Wallpaper attracts positive energy, boosts fortune, and empowers your desires beyond Angel Candles.

list.name: Sigil Beauty
list.desc: Created with the purpose of enhancing beauty, attractiveness, or confidence.

list.name: Sigil Grimoire
list.desc: "Beauty of Goddess" This sigil channels powerful energy to enhance beauty, making you more alluring and desirable.

list.name: Fortune Clover
list.desc: Absorbs a powerful amount of energy to bring you prosperity and financial security.

list.name: NiNa's Charms Spells
list.desc: Handcrafted charms spells to attract positive energy, provide protection, and support your desires.

list.name: Crystal Magic Spell
list.desc: Enhanced crystal charm, 4 times stronger than spell stones, amplifying desires and providing maximum protection.

list.name: Magic Lipstick
list.desc: Magic Lipstick boosts confidence, charm, and luck, activating positive energy with every swipe
